downloadTitle: MVP Session 24: Build scaled drawings and space plans in Visio 2010
downloadDescription: Watch a brief demonstration of features that help you create scaled drawings in Visio 2010.
detailsSection:
Learn how to create scaled drawings using space plan diagrams in Microsoft Visio 2010. This video reviews several features that help you build drawings to scale, such as performing simple calculations in the Shape Data window to adjust the size of shapes or using the controller dimension shape to ensure that different elements are spaced appropriately and accurately. It also covers using the space shape and AutoSize feature to easily find interior dimensions. 
This video is part of a series covering the basics of how to use Visio features and capabilities. Visit http://visio.microsoft.com/MVPSessions to learn more and view other videos in this series.
installInstructionSection: The video has two downloadable resolution: 1000k/lowest and 8000k/highest. Click Download to save the video to your computer.
